author: upayavira
msg: Added permanent redirects to <map:redirect-to> using permanent="true" attribute.
Permanent redirect sends status 301 instead of 302. This is interpreted differently
by user agents in relation to whether they cache the page that is returned, thus
permanent redirects are far more search-engine friendly.

author: cziegeler
msg: Fixing double invocation of internal pipelines

author: cziegeler
msg: Don't include manifest as a separate file
